Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails. Review the playtesting schedule and prepare test cases for the day.
Conduct playtesting session for core game mechanics. Document any issues encountered.
Break. Review initial findings from the playtesting session.
Continue playtesting session, focusing on secondary mechanics. Take detailed notes.
Compile initial bug report from morning sessions. Categorize bugs by severity.
Email @cdev-1 @cdev-2 @cdev-3 with initial bug findings for their review.
Organize and prioritize bugs for further investigation.
Wrap up for the day. Update the bug tracking system with today's findings.
